name: Hemophiliac Vampire
description:
A vampire suffering from hemophilia (a bleeding disorder) finds itself mortally wounded. With its life essence constantly draining, it must constantly find fresh prey in order to survive. The blood of its victims will only delay the vampire's inevitable doom.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Click to Attack
  • Hold Mouse for bigger attack
  • Click quickly to dash
  • F for Fullscreen
